titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on the Budget.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on the Budget.

action.text: Committee on the Budget. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Enzi. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on the Budget for the 115th Congress.
